actions.subcommittee: Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Seapower and Strategic and Critical Materials

official_title: A bill to reaffirm the policy in current law concerning construction of United States naval vessels on the Pacific Coast and to direct the President to report to Congress on the implementation of that policy.

summary.text: Reaffirms U.S. policy stating that the Department of the Navy shall construct on the Pacific coast such U.S. naval vessels as the President deems necessary to protect the requirements of national defense. Requires the President, within 60 days of enactment of this Act, to report to the Congress on actions taken or planned in order to implement such policy.

titles.title: A bill to reaffirm the policy in current law concerning construction of United States naval vessels on the Pacific Coast and to direct the President to report to Congress on the implementation of that policy.
